name: kirakiratter / キラキラッター
description:
CSS Style for Mastodon made to look like KiraKiratter, the twitter app from hit idol show: Aikatsu!
マストドンのためのCSSはキラキラッターのように見える!アイカツ!
additional_info:
V9.0 -- Works with Mastodon V1.3.X
Kirakiratter users do not need this, as it is part of the website natively.
github: https://github.com/MasterDalK/kktCSS

style_setting_options.label: On
